TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit STGMEDIUM extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 提供用於資料傳輸作業的通用全域記憶體控制代碼。

span.span: Provides a generalized global memory handle to use for data transfer operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關使用 STGMEDIUM 結構和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 進行程式設計的詳細資訊，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the STGMEDIUM structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
